item.title: Object Oriented Programing Implementation
item.description: Object Oriented Programming Class & Object 4 fundamental principles of OOP Class-bases Prototype-bases How Javascript implements OOP How Python implements OOp References & more resources P/S: Nếu có gì sai sót xin gửi email cho mình để cập nhật, xin cảm ơn!
